OptionDisplayGroup.name: groupVanillaMinecraft
OptionDisplayGroup.Description: Distribution options for Vanilla Minecraft Ores.

Choice.description: Clay is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: vnlaClayFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Vanilla Minecraft Clay distributions

OptionNumeric.name: vnlaClaySize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Vanilla Minecraft Clay distributions

Choice.description: Coal is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: vnlaCoalFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Vanilla Minecraft Coal distributions

OptionNumeric.name: vnlaCoalSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Vanilla Minecraft Coal distributions

Choice.description: Iron is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: vnlaIronFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Vanilla Minecraft Iron distributions

OptionNumeric.name: vnlaIronSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Vanilla Minecraft Iron distributions

Choice.description: Gold is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: vnlaGoldFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Vanilla Minecraft Gold distributions

OptionNumeric.name: vnlaGoldSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Vanilla Minecraft Gold distributions

Choice.description: Redstone is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: vnlaRedstoneFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Vanilla Minecraft Redstone distributions

OptionNumeric.name: vnlaRedstoneSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Vanilla Minecraft Redstone distributions

Choice.description: Diamond is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: vnlaDiamondFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Vanilla Minecraft Diamond distributions

OptionNumeric.name: vnlaDiamondSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Vanilla Minecraft Diamond distributions

OptionChoice.name: vnlaLapisLazuliDist
OptionChoice.Description: Controls how Lapis Lazuli is generated

Choice.description: Lapis Lazuli is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: vnlaLapisLazuliFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Vanilla Minecraft Lapis Lazuli distributions

OptionNumeric.name: vnlaLapisLazuliSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Vanilla Minecraft Lapis Lazuli distributions

Choice.description: Emerald is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: vnlaEmeraldFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Vanilla Minecraft Emerald distributions

OptionNumeric.name: vnlaEmeraldSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Vanilla Minecraft Emerald distributions

OptionChoice.name: vnlaNetherQuartzDist
OptionChoice.Description: Controls how Nether Quartz is generated

Choice.description: Nether Quartz is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: vnlaNetherQuartzFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Vanilla Minecraft Nether Quartz distributions

OptionNumeric.name: vnlaNetherQuartzSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Vanilla Minecraft Nether Quartz distributions

Substitute.name: vnlaOverworldOreSubstitute0
Substitute.Comment: The global option deferredPopulationRange must be large enough to catch all ore clusters (>= 32).

Substitute.name: vnlaOverworldOreSubstitute1
Substitute.Comment: The global option deferredPopulationRange must be large enough to catch all ore clusters (>= 32).

Veins.name: vnlaClayBaseVeins
Veins.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.

Veins.name: vnlaClayBaseVeins
Veins.Description: Small motherlodes without any branches. Similar to the deposits produced by StandardGen distributions.

Cloud.name: vnlaClayBaseCloud
Cloud.Description: Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore. These are huge, spanning several adjacent chunks, and consequently rather rare. They contain a sizeable amount of ore, but it takes some time and effort to mine due to low density. The intent for strategic clouds is that the player will need to actively search for one and then set up a semi-permanent mining base and spend some time actually mining the ore.

Veins.name: vnlaClayBaseHintVeins
Veins.Description: Single blocks, generously scattered through all heights (density is about that of vanilla iron ore). They will replace dirt and sandstone (but not grass or sand), so they can be found nearer to the surface than most ores. Intened to be used as a child distribution for large, rare strategic deposits that would otherwise be very difficult to find.

Veins.name: vnlaCoalBaseVeins
Veins.Description: Large veins filled very lightly with ore. Because they contain less ore per volume, these veins are relatively wide and long. Mining the ore from them is time consuming compared to solid ore veins. They are also more difficult to follow, since it is harder to get an idea of their direction while mining.

Veins.name: vnlaCoalPrefersVeins
Veins.Description: Spawns 2 more times in preferred biomes.

Veins.name: vnlaCoalBaseVeins
Veins.Description: Small motherlodes without any branches. Similar to the deposits produced by StandardGen distributions.

Veins.name: vnlaCoalPrefersVeins
Veins.Description: Spawns 2 more times in preferred biomes.

Veins.Description: Spawns 2 more times in preferred biomes.

StandardGen.name: vnlaCoalPrefersStandard
StandardGen.Description: Spawns 2 more times in preferred biomes.

Veins.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.

Veins.name: vnlaIronPrefersVeins
Veins.Description: Spawns 2 more times in preferred biomes. 2 times as likely in preferred biomes.

Veins.Description: Small motherlodes without any branches. Similar to the deposits produced by StandardGen distributions.

Veins.name: vnlaDiamondBaseVeins
Veins.Description: Short sparsely filled veins sloping up from near the bottom of the map.
